overview: In search of sweet whores for her escort agency, Kristina even ventures into a monastery. Let's just accompany them behind the thick walls, where still waters are particularly deep. Nuns also appreciate full candles in their free time! And when they really let the pig fly, streets and beaches are pretty unsafe for lively men. Kristina once again proves that she has an excellent nose for hot cum parties!
title: Kristina Belanova 4
